Description: The unique database ID of the developer
The name of the developer or vendor of the certified health IT product
Link to the CHPL developer page

Allowed Formats or Values: Active; Suspended by ONC; Under certification ban by ONC
Description: The current status of the developer within the program
The date this direct review was initiated

Required for each Direct Review Activity: Required if there are no open Requirements
Description: The date this direct review was completed, if applicable

Allowed Formats or Values: Patient safety issue; Impediment to ONC-ACB; Noncompliance to Conditions and Maintenance of Certification
Description: List of one or more applicable circumstances for ONC to conduct this direct review
A specific program requirement under review; contains reference to regulation and description

Required for each Direct Review Activity: Required if Direct Review Ended is not null
Description: Result of Direct Review to indicate whether a non-conformity was found
The type of non-conformity found during the review; contains reference to regulation and description
Indicates whether the non-conformity is open or closed (has been resolved)
The date that ONC determined that a non-conformity was present
The date ONC approved the corrective action plan proposed by the developer
The date that the corrective action was started

Required for each Direct Review Activity: Required if "CAP Approval Date" is not null
Description: The date that the corrective action must be completed in order to avoid termination of the certified product’s certification status and/or a certification ban of the developer, as applicable
The date that the corrective action was completed
A brief summary describing why the certified product and/or developer was found to be non-conformant
A detailed description of the ONC findings related to the non-conformity
A detailed description of how the non-conformity was resolved

Allowed Formats or Values: List of CHPL IDs associated with this Direct Review
Description: List of all of the certified products associated with this direct review, as applicable
The updated date and time in the system of the non-conformity activity
The last time this information was refreshed from the database
